name: @jandedobbeleer/oh-my-posh-validator
description: Validate oh-my-posh theme configurations (JSON, YAML, TOML) against the official schema with detailed error reporting and recommendations.
longDescription: The Oh My Posh Validator is an MCP server that validates oh-my-posh prompt theme configurations against the official JSON schema. It supports multiple formats (JSON, YAML, and TOML), provides detailed validation errors with JSON paths, and offers helpful warnings and best practice recommendations. Perfect for theme authors, users customizing their prompts, and AI assistants helping with oh-my-posh configuration.

tools.name: validate_config
tools.description: Validates oh-my-posh configuration files against the official schema

content.description: The configuration content as a string (JSON, YAML, or TOML)

format.description: The format of the configuration (auto-detect if not specified)

useCases: Validate oh-my-posh theme configurations before applying them
Debug configuration errors with detailed error messages
Get recommendations for best practices and deprecated features
Ensure configuration compatibility with the latest oh-my-posh version
Assist AI tools in helping users create valid configurations
